channel.title: Senior is that it..? (how about a vote)
channel.description:
I have just been wondering and thought of how the posting is.. Ok so you have Junior member And then member and then you have Senior member..? is that it...? no more rankings from there... in my opinion there should be a few more ranks you lose interest after you reach 100 post.. only having 100 post and bam that's it you have maxed out (sounds abit like a rsps with ::max and your done..
Come on moparscape bring out some more ranks and make it so there is a goal to get..

item.title: Senior is that it..? (how about a vote)
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:41, topic:336886”][quote author=jme link=topic=433301.msg3184363#msg3184363 date=1271599318]
Awards ARE a feature. It’s just rare that anyone from moparscape gets them, because they don’t meet the requirements. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1766.0.html
[/quote]
I think there are a few people on moparscape that might meet the requirements for the Bat Cup, but not much else.[/quote]

True. Though for some reason that hasn’t been given out for a very long time.

Read full topic
item.source: Senior is that it..? (how about a vote)

item.title: Senior is that it..? (how about a vote)

deathschaos9:

If Moparisthebest said post count doesn’t matter than why is this thread still open?

If Moparisthebest said post count doesn’t matter than why is this thread still open?

item.title: Senior is that it..? (how about a vote)
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:33, topic:336886”][quote author=Frell link=topic=433301.msg3182822#msg3182822 date=1271468765]
Fuck post count, we don’t need people spamming just to have a different status.
[/quote]

Pretty much. Having the highest rank at 100 posts just drives home the principal of this site that post count doesn’t matter. If we made more ranks, that would be like saying post count matters a little bit, and it doesn’t.[/quote]
<3

Read full topic
item.source: Senior is that it..? (how about a vote)

item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:35, topic:336886”][quote author=Javafire link=topic=433301.msg3183779#msg3183779 date=1271545957]

Being honest even if there was more post-count based groups added, it would be pointless as people would just reach the group in around 2 weeks, then you’ll be as bored again with the groups as you are now.

true, this forum does have awards right?
[/quote]

I would agree that awards would be a cool feature, it would make us different from the other community’s. :P[/quote]

Awards ARE a feature. It’s just rare that anyone from moparscape gets them, because they don’t meet the requirements. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1766.0.html

item.title: Senior is that it..? (how about a vote)
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

[quote=“Javafire, post:27, topic:336886”][quote author=Primadude link=topic=433301.msg3183372#msg3183372 date=1271523265]

[quote author=Javafire link=topic=433301.msg3183340#msg3183340 date=1271521951]

After senior member people usually just become vets or stay where they are.

Theres not even that many staff on here. if someone spams it takes a day for the posts to be locked

There is many staff on these (mitb & mscp) Forums.
[/quote] i have more staff on MY forums, considering they all cover different time zones. there are not much staff on here and they basically quit after about 4 months or half a year.

You probably take on anyone into the staff team who you think is good for the spot. Staff choosing for this forum is a choice made by all of the staff members and takes time to make a final decision.
[/quote] no, i have ALL the users vote… my forums are a democracy, not a monarchy[/quote]

There are many staff acctually…

Read full topic
item.source: Senior is that it..? (how about a vote)
